root: ^Hi there! You must be wondering where are all the other NPCs?

Divert1Choice1: ^Seems like you’re the quiet type eh? Maybe the developers should enable player interaction?
Divert1Choice2: ^Hey! I know this is an RPG but that doesn’t mean you should hit the first NPC that you see!
Divert2: ^Ahem. Anyway, I would like to first welcome you to Prototype Town! The town that is currently being cursed by an Inprogress Spell which brings you back to me...
Divert3: ^Unfortunately, due to “time constraints”, I am also probably the only NPC here to guide you. Sorta.
Divert4: ^Lately, the Logs in the forest have become restless and would attack whoever passes by...
Divert5: ^Help me calm down the Logs in the forest, and if possible, find the cause of their aggression.
